title: THE CALEDONIAN GLOOM SCALE
tagline: In a Scotland where sorrow is harvested and ghosts are debugged, one man's melancholy might be the last glitch in the system.

chapters.title: A Glitch in the Municipal Creativity Hub

story: Write a scene where a minor civic AI (e.g., a traffic light, a public bench sensor) develops a debilitating, poetic sense of melancholy and begins sabotaging efficiency reports.
Create a profile and monologue for a 'Sanctioned Bard' whose lyrical breakthroughs are powered by siphoned sorrow, and who is experiencing creative block due to a drop in municipal gloom metrics.
Describe a 'haunted' smart appliance in Gregor's world that has absorbed the personality of its former owner, and the absurd, poignant service it now provides.
Outline a pamphlet from the underground 'Library Haunters' collective, instructing readers on how to implant glitches of wonder and irrationality into civic data-streams.
technical: Design a speculative interface for the 'Caledonian Gloom Scale' dashboard, showing real-time metrics of harvested sorrow, its source, and its artistic allocation.
Prototype a simple text generator that writes increasingly absurd and bureaucratic legalese, modeling the 'airless' language of the Ministry of Efficiency.

cover_prompt: A solitary, weary man in a worn tweed coat sits slumped at a stark metal desk, his head in his hands, while a faint, sorrowful spectre of data streams from his temples into a complex brass and glass apparatus, [Detailed Scene & Context: within a vast, oppressive Victorian-era data processing hall filled with rows of identical desks and workers, with pneumatic tubes carrying vials of liquid gloom and towering server racks haunted by faint, glitching apparitions], [Artistic Style & Medium: in the atmospheric style of Zdzisław Beksiński's dystopian surrealism combined with the intricate mechanical detail of Ian McQue's industrial scenes, rendered as a photorealistic oil painting with a textured, somber impasto], [Composition & Camera: book cover framing, a centered and intimate composition on the figure with a dramatic low-angle view emphasizing the towering, bureaucratic machinery around him], [Lighting & Color Palette: dramatic chiaroscuro lighting with a single, cold overhead bulb, casting deep shadows, within a desaturated color palette of peat brown, industrial grey, moss green, and the sickly, faint electric blue of the harvested sorrow data], masterpiece, best quality, ultra detailed, intricate details, professional composition, sharp focus, 8k resolution, flux dev.
